title: Borel Algebra on ` ( RR X. RR ) `

blocks.name: br2base
blocks.content: The base set for the generator of the Borel sigma-algebra on ` ( RR X. RR ) ` is indeed ` ( RR X. RR ) ` . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 22-Sep-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm br2base(setvar s0, setvar s1) {
  |- wceq(cuni(crn(cmpo(s0, s1, cbrsiga, cbrsiga, cxp(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), cxp(cr, cr))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
} = {
  mpbi(wceq(cuni(crn(cmpo(s0, s1, cbrsiga, cbrsiga, cxp(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), cxp(cr, cr)), wss(crn(cmpo(s0, s1, cbrsiga, cbrsiga, cxp(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), cpw(cxp(cr, cr))))
  ax-mp(wss(crn(cmpo(s0, s1, cbrsiga, cbrsiga, cxp(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), cpw(cxp(cr, cr))), wral(s0, cbrsiga, wral(s1, cbrsiga, wcel(cxp(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cpw(cxp(cr, cr))))))
  rgen2a(s0, s1, cbrsiga, wcel(cxp(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cpw(cxp(cr, cr))))
  sylibr(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cbrsiga), wcel(cv(s1), cbrsiga)), wcel(cxp(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cpw(cxp(cr, cr))), wss(cxp(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cxp(cr, cr)))
  syl2an(wcel(cv(s0), cbrsiga), wcel(cv(s1), cbrsiga), wss(cxp(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cxp(cr, cr)), wss(cv(s0), cr), wss(cv(s1), cr))
  elpwid(cv(s0), cr, wcel(cv(s0), cbrsiga))
  sseli(cv(s0), cbrsiga, cpw(cr))
  elpwid(cv(s1), cr, wcel(cv(s1), cbrsiga))
  sseli(cv(s1), cbrsiga, cpw(cr))
  brsigasspwrn()
  xpss12(cv(s0), cr, cv(s1), cr)
  elpw(cxp(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cxp(cr, cr))
  rnmpt2ss(s0, s1, cbrsiga, cbrsiga, cxp(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cpw(cxp(cr, cr)), cmpo(s0, s1, cbrsiga, cbrsiga, cxp(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  ax-mp(wb(wss(crn(cmpo(s0, s1, cbrsiga, cbrsiga, cxp(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), cpw(cxp(cr, cr))), wceq(cuni(crn(cmpo(s0, s1, cbrsiga, cbrsiga, cxp(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), cxp(cr, cr))), wcel(cxp(cr, cr), crn(cmpo(s0, s1, cbrsiga, cbrsiga, cxp(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  mpbir(wcel(cxp(cr, cr), crn(cmpo(s0, s1, cbrsiga, cbrsiga, cxp(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wrex(s0, cbrsiga, wrex(s1, cbrsiga, wceq(cxp(cr, cr), cxp(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  mp3an(wrex(s0, cbrsiga, wrex(s1, cbrsiga, wceq(cxp(cr, cr), cxp(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wcel(cr, cbrsiga), wcel(cr, cbrsiga), wceq(cxp(cr, cr), cxp(cr, cr)))
  eqeltrri(cr, cbrsiga, cuni(cbrsiga))
  unibrsiga()
  mp2b(wcel(cuni(cbrsiga), cbrsiga), wcel(cbrsiga, cfv(csiga, cr)), wcel(cbrsiga, cuni(crn(csiga))))
  brsigarn()
  elrnsiga(cbrsiga, cr)
  unielsiga(cbrsiga)
  eqid(cxp(cr, cr))
  rspc2ev(s0, s1, cr, cbrsiga, cr, cbrsiga, wceq(cxp(cr, cr), cxp(cr, cr)), wceq(cxp(cr, cr), cxp(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(cxp(cr, cr), cxp(cr, cv(s1))))
  eqeq2d(cxp(cr, cr), cxp(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cxp(cr, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cr))
  xpeq1(cv(s0), cr, cv(s1))
  eqeq2d(cxp(cr, cr), cxp(cr, cv(s1)), cxp(cr, cr), wceq(cv(s1), cr))
  xpeq2(cv(s1), cr, cr)
  elrnmpt2(s0, s1, cxp(cr, cr), cmpo(s0, s1, cbrsiga, cbrsiga, cxp(cv(s0), cv(s1))), cbrsiga, cbrsiga, cxp(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  eqid(cmpo(s0, s1, cbrsiga, cbrsiga, cxp(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  xpex(cv(s0), cv(s1))
  vex(s0)
  vex(s1)
  elpwuni(cxp(cr, cr), crn(cmpo(s0, s1, cbrsiga, cbrsiga, cxp(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  diff.cbrsiga.s(s1)
  diff.cpw.s(s0, cxp(cr, cr))
  diff.cpw.s(s1, cxp(cr, cr))
  diff.cbrsiga.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cxp(cr, cr), cxp(cr, cv(s1)))
  diff.cxp.s(s0, cr, cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cxp(cr, cr), cxp(cr, cr))
  diff.cxp.s(s0, cr, cr)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diff.cxp.s(s1, cr, cr)
  diff.cr.s(s1)

thm br2base(setvar s0, setvar s1) {
  ⊢ ⋃ ran((s0 ∈ BrSiga, s1 ∈ BrSiga ↦(s0 × s1)))=(ℝ × ℝ)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
} = {
  mpbi(⋃ ran((s0 ∈ BrSiga, s1 ∈ BrSiga ↦(s0 × s1)))=(ℝ × ℝ), ran((s0 ∈ BrSiga, s1 ∈ BrSiga ↦(s0 × s1)))⊆ P((ℝ × ℝ)))
  ax-mp(ran((s0 ∈ BrSiga, s1 ∈ BrSiga ↦(s0 × s1)))⊆ P((ℝ × ℝ)), ∀(s0 ∈ BrSiga, ∀(s1 ∈ BrSiga,(s0 × s1)∈ P((ℝ × ℝ)))))
  rgen2a(s0, s1, cbrsiga, (s0 × s1)∈ P((ℝ × ℝ)))
  sylibr((s0 ∈ BrSiga ∧ s1 ∈ BrSiga), (s0 × s1)∈ P((ℝ × ℝ)), (s0 × s1)⊆(ℝ × ℝ))
  syl2an(s0 ∈ BrSiga, s1 ∈ BrSiga, (s0 × s1)⊆(ℝ × ℝ), s0 ⊆ ℝ, s1 ⊆ ℝ)
  elpwid(s0, cr, s0 ∈ BrSiga)
  sseli(s0, cbrsiga, P(ℝ))
  elpwid(s1, cr, s1 ∈ BrSiga)
  sseli(s1, cbrsiga, P(ℝ))
  brsigasspwrn()
  xpss12(s0, cr, s1, cr)
  elpw((s0 × s1), (ℝ × ℝ))
  rnmpt2ss(s0, s1, cbrsiga, cbrsiga, (s0 × s1), P((ℝ × ℝ)), (s0 ∈ BrSiga, s1 ∈ BrSiga ↦(s0 × s1)))
  ax-mp((ran((s0 ∈ BrSiga, s1 ∈ BrSiga ↦(s0 × s1)))⊆ P((ℝ × ℝ))↔ ⋃ ran((s0 ∈ BrSiga, s1 ∈ BrSiga ↦(s0 × s1)))=(ℝ × ℝ)), (ℝ × ℝ)∈ ran((s0 ∈ BrSiga, s1 ∈ BrSiga ↦(s0 × s1))))
  mpbir((ℝ × ℝ)∈ ran((s0 ∈ BrSiga, s1 ∈ BrSiga ↦(s0 × s1))), ∃(s0 ∈ BrSiga, ∃(s1 ∈ BrSiga,(ℝ × ℝ)=(s0 × s1))))
  mp3an(∃(s0 ∈ BrSiga, ∃(s1 ∈ BrSiga,(ℝ × ℝ)=(s0 × s1))), ℝ ∈ BrSiga, ℝ ∈ BrSiga, (ℝ × ℝ)=(ℝ × ℝ))
  eqeltrri(cr, cbrsiga, ⋃ BrSiga)
  unibrsiga()
  mp2b(⋃ BrSiga ∈ BrSiga, BrSiga ∈(sigAlgebra ` ℝ), BrSiga ∈ ⋃ ran(sigAlgebra))
  brsigarn()
  elrnsiga(cbrsiga, cr)
  unielsiga(cbrsiga)
  eqid((ℝ × ℝ))
  rspc2ev(s0, s1, cr, cbrsiga, cr, cbrsiga, (ℝ × ℝ)=(ℝ × ℝ), (ℝ × ℝ)=(s0 × s1), (ℝ × ℝ)=(ℝ × s1))
  eqeq2d((ℝ × ℝ), (s0 × s1), (ℝ × s1), s0 = ℝ)
  xpeq1(s0, cr, s1)
  eqeq2d((ℝ × ℝ), (ℝ × s1), (ℝ × ℝ), s1 = ℝ)
  xpeq2(s1, cr, cr)
  elrnmpt2(s0, s1, (ℝ × ℝ), (s0 ∈ BrSiga, s1 ∈ BrSiga ↦(s0 × s1)), cbrsiga, cbrsiga, (s0 × s1))
  eqid((s0 ∈ BrSiga, s1 ∈ BrSiga ↦(s0 × s1)))
  xpex(s0, s1)
  vex(s0)
  vex(s1)
  elpwuni((ℝ × ℝ), ran((s0 ∈ BrSiga, s1 ∈ BrSiga ↦(s0 × s1))))
  diff.cbrsiga.s(s1)
  diff.cpw.s(s0, (ℝ × ℝ))
  diff.cpw.s(s1, (ℝ × ℝ))
  diff.cbrsiga.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, (ℝ × ℝ), (ℝ × s1))
  diff.cxp.s(s0, cr, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, (ℝ × ℝ), (ℝ × ℝ))
  diff.cxp.s(s0, cr, cr)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diff.cxp.s(s1, cr, cr)
  diff.cr.s(s1)
}

  a1ii(wceq(cuni(cun(crn(cmpt(s0, cr, cxp(co(cv(s0), cico, cpnf), cr))), crn(cmpt(s1, cr, cxp(cr, co(cv(s1), cico, cpnf)))))), cxp(cr, cr)), diffss(s0, s1))

  sseli(cv(hs0), crn(cmpt(s0, cr, cxp(co(cv(s0), cico, cpnf), cr))), cpw(cxp(cr, cr)))

  rnmptss(s0, cr, cxp(co(cv(s0), cico, cpnf), cr), cpw(cxp(cr, cr)), cmpt(s0, cr, cxp(co(cv(s0), cico, cpnf), cr)))

  mpan2(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wss(co(cv(s0), cico, cpnf), cr), wcel(cpnf, cxr))

blocks.name: dya2iocival
blocks.content: The function ` I ` returns closed-below open-above dyadic rational intervals covering the real line. This is the same construction as in ~ dyadmbl . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 24-Sep-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm dya2iocival(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wceq(co(c1, c2, c0), co(co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c0)), cico, co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c0)))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpo(s0, s1, cz, cz, co(co(cv(s0), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1))), cico, co(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wceq(co(c1, c2, c0), co(co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c0)), cico, co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c0))))), wceq(c3, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo))))
  ancoms(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wceq(co(c1, c2, c0), co(co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c0)), cico, co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c0)))))
  ovmpt2(hs0, hs1, c1, cz, c0, cz, c2, co(co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c0)), cico, co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c0))), co(co(cv(hs0), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(hs1))), cico, co(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(hs1)))), co(co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(hs1))), cico, co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(hs1)))))
  oveq12d(co(cv(hs0), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(hs1))), cico, co(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(hs1))), co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(hs1))), co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(hs1)))
  oveq1d(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(hs1)), co(c1, caddc, nat1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), c1, caddc, nat1)
  oveq12d(co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(hs1))), cico, co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(hs1))), co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c0)), co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c0)), wceq(cv(hs1), c0))
  oveq2d(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(hs1)), co(nat2, cexp, c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c0))
  oveq2d(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(hs1)), co(nat2, cexp, c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c0))
  oveq2(cv(hs1), c0, nat2, cexp)
  eqtr4i(c2, cmpo(hs0, hs1, cz, cz, co(co(cv(hs0), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(hs1))), cico, co(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(hs1))))), cmpo(s0, s1, cz, cz, co(co(cv(s0), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1))), cico, co(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1))))))
  cbvmpt2v(hs0, hs1, s0, s1, cz, cz, co(co(cv(hs0), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(hs1))), cico, co(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(hs1)))), co(co(cv(s0), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1))), cico, co(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1)))), co(co(cv(s0), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(hs1))), cico, co(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(hs1)))))
  oveq12d(co(cv(hs0), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(hs1))), cico, co(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(hs1))), co(cv(s0), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(hs1))), co(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), cv(s0), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(hs1)))
  oveq1d(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(hs1)), co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), cv(s0), caddc, nat1)
  oveq12d(co(cv(s0), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(hs1))), cico, co(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(hs1))), co(cv(s0), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1))), co(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1))), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(s1)))
  oveq2d(cv(s0), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(hs1)), co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(s1)))
  oveq2d(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(hs1)), co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(s1)))
  oveq2(cv(hs1), cv(s1), nat2, cexp)
  ovex(co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c0)), cico, co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c0)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cz)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(co(co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c0)), cico, co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c0))))
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cz)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(co(co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c0)), cico, co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c0))))
  diff.hs0.c(co(co(cv(s0), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1))), cico, co(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1)))))
  diff.hs1.c(co(co(cv(s0), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1))), cico, co(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1)))))
  diff.cz.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(hs1))), cico, co(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(hs1))))
  diff.co.s(s0, cv(hs0), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(hs1)))
  diff.cico.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(hs1)))
  diff.co.s(s0, cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.cdiv.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat2, cexp, cv(hs1))
  diff.nat2.s(s0)
  diff.cexp.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.cz.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(hs1))), cico, co(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(hs1))))
  diff.co.s(s1, cv(hs0), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(hs1)))
  diff.cico.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(hs1)))
  diff.co.s(s1, cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.caddc.s(s1)
  diff.nat1.s(s1)
  diff.cdiv.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, nat2, cexp, cv(hs1))
  diff.nat2.s(s1)

blocks.name: dya2iocress
blocks.content: Dyadic intervals are subsets of ` RR ` . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 18-Sep-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm dya2iocress(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wss(co(c1, c2, c0), cr))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpo(s0, s1, cz, cz, co(co(cv(s0), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1))), cico, co(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
} = {
  eqsstrd(co(c1, c2, c0), cr, co(co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c0)), cico, co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c0))), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)))
  dya2iocival(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wss(co(co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c0)), cico, co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c0))), cr), wcel(co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c0)), cr), wcel(co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c0)), cxr))
  rerpdivcld(c1, co(nat2, cexp, c0), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)))
  rexrd(co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c0)), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)))
  rerpdivcld(co(c1, caddc, nat1), co(nat2, cexp, c0), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)))
  readdcld(c1, nat1, wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)))
  zred(c1, wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz))
  1red(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)))
  rpexpcld(nat2, c0, wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wcel(nat2, crp))
  2rp()
  simpl(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz))
  icossre(co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c0)), co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c0)))
}

thm dya2iocbrsiga(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wcel(co(c1, c2, c0), cbrsiga))

  -| diffss(s0, s1)
} = {
  eqeltrd(co(c1, c2, c0), cbrsiga, co(co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c0)), cico, co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c0))), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)))
  dya2iocival(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  syl6eqelr(co(co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c0)), cico, co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c0))), cbrsiga, cdif(co(cmnf, cioo, co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c0))), co(cmnf, cioo, co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c0)))), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)))
  syl31anc(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wceq(cdif(co(cmnf, cioo, co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c0))), co(cmnf, cioo, co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c0)))), co(co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c0)), cico, co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c0)))), wcel(cmnf, cxr), wcel(co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c0)), cxr), wcel(co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c0)), cxr), wbr(cmnf, clt, co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c0))))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wcel(cmnf, cxr))
  mnfxr()
  rexrd(co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c0)), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)))
  rexrd(co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c0)), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)))
  rerpdivcld(co(c1, caddc, nat1), co(nat2, cexp, c0), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)))
  readdcld(c1, nat1, wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)))
  1red(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wbr(cmnf, clt, co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c0))), wcel(co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c0)), cr))
  rerpdivcld(c1, co(nat2, cexp, c0), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)))
  zred(c1, wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz))
  rpexpcld(nat2, c0, wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wcel(nat2, crp))
  2rp()
  simpl(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz))
  mnflt(co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c0)))
  difioo(cmnf, co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c0)), co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c0)))
  mp3an(wcel(cdif(co(cmnf, cioo, co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c0))), co(cmnf, cioo, co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c0)))), cbrsiga), wcel(cbrsiga, cuni(crn(csiga))), wcel(co(cmnf, cioo, co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c0))), cbrsiga), wcel(co(cmnf, cioo, co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c0))), cbrsiga))
  ax-mp(wcel(cbrsiga, cuni(crn(csiga))), wcel(cbrsiga, cfv(csiga, cr)))
  brsigarn()
  elrnsiga(cbrsiga, cr)
  eleqtrri(co(cmnf, cioo, co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c0))), cbrsiga, cfv(csigagen, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo))))
  mp2an(wcel(co(cmnf, cioo, co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c0))), cfv(csigagen, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))), wcel(cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)), ctop), wcel(co(cmnf, cioo, co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c0))), cfv(ctg, crn(cioo))))
  iooretop(cmnf, co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c0)))
  elsigagen(cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)), ctop, co(cmnf, cioo, co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c0))))
  eleqtrri(co(cmnf, cioo, co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c0))), cbrsiga, cfv(csigagen, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo))))
  mp2an(wcel(co(cmnf, cioo, co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c0))), cfv(csigagen, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))), wcel(cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)), ctop), wcel(co(cmnf, cioo, co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c0))), cfv(ctg, crn(cioo))))
  retop()

  2rp()
  simpr(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(cv(s1), cz))
  mnflt(co(cv(s0), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1))))
  difioo(cmnf, co(cv(s0), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1))), co(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1))))
  mp3an(wcel(cdif(co(cmnf, cioo, co(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1)))), co(cmnf, cioo, co(cv(s0), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1))))), cbrsiga), wcel(cbrsiga, cuni(crn(csiga))), wcel(co(cmnf, cioo, co(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1)))), cbrsiga), wcel(co(cmnf, cioo, co(cv(s0), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1)))), cbrsiga))
  ax-mp(wcel(cbrsiga, cuni(crn(csiga))), wcel(cbrsiga, cfv(csiga, cr)))
  brsigarn()
  elrnsiga(cbrsiga, cr)
  eleqtrri(co(cmnf, cioo, co(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1)))), cbrsiga, cfv(csigagen, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo))))
  mp2an(wcel(co(cmnf, cioo, co(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1)))), cfv(csigagen, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))), wcel(cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)), ctop), wcel(co(cmnf, cioo, co(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1)))), cfv(ctg, crn(cioo))))

  elsigagen(cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)), ctop, co(cmnf, cioo, co(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1)))))
  eleqtrri(co(cmnf, cioo, co(cv(s0), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1)))), cbrsiga, cfv(csigagen, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo))))
  mp2an(wcel(co(cmnf, cioo, co(cv(s0), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1)))), cfv(csigagen, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))), wcel(cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)), ctop), wcel(co(cmnf, cioo, co(cv(s0), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1)))), cfv(ctg, crn(cioo))))

blocks.name: dya2icoseg
blocks.content: For any point and any closed-below, open-above interval of ` RR ` centered on that point, there is a closed-below open-above dyadic rational interval which contains that point and is included in the original interval. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 19-Sep-2017.)
blocks.origin:

  -| wceq(c3, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpo(s1, s2, cz, cz, co(co(cv(s1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s2))), cico, co(co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s2))))))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cfl, co(nat1, cmin, co(nat2, clogb, c1))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, crp)), wrex(s0, crn(c2), wa(wcel(c0, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), co(co(c0, cmin, c1), cioo, co(c0, caddc, c1)))))), diffss(s0, s1))

blocks.name: dya2icoseg2
blocks.content: For any point and any open interval of ` RR ` containing that point, there is a closed-below open-above dyadic rational interval which contains that point and is included in the original interval. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 12-Oct-2017.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: dya2iocrfn
blocks.content: The function returning dyadic square covering for a given size has domain ` ( ran I X. ran I ) ` . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 19-Sep-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm dya2iocrfn(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wfn(c0, cxp(crn(c1), crn(c1)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpo(s0, s1, cz, cz, co(co(cv(s0), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1))), cico, co(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1))))))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpo(s2, s3, crn(c1), crn(c1), cxp(cv(s2), cv(s3))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s3, c1)
} = {
  a1ii(wfn(c0, cxp(crn(c1), crn(c1))), wceq(c2, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo))))
  a1ii(wfn(c0, cxp(crn(c1), crn(c1))), wceq(c1, cmpo(s0, s1, cz, cz, co(co(cv(s0), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1))), cico, co(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1)))))))
  a1ii(wfn(c0, cxp(crn(c1), crn(c1))), diffss(s0, s1))
  a1ii(wfn(c0, cxp(crn(c1), crn(c1))), diffsc(s0, c1))
  fnmpt2i(s2, s3, c0, crn(c1), crn(c1), cxp(cv(s2), cv(s3)))
  xpex(cv(s2), cv(s3))
  vex(s2)
  vex(s3)
  diff.crn.s(s2, c1)
  diff.crn.s(s3, c1)
}

thm dya2iocct(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ran(c0)[≼]_om
  ⊣ c1 =(topGen ` ran((,)))
  ⊣ c2 =(s0 ∈ ℤ, s1 ∈ ℤ ↦((s0[÷](2[^]s1))[[,)]((s0[+]1)[÷](2[^]s1))))
  ⊣ c0 =(s2 ∈ ran(c2), s3 ∈ ran(c2)↦(s2 × s3))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s3, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(ran(c0)[≼]_om, c1 =(topGen ` ran((,))))
  a1ii(ran(c0)[≼]_om, d(s0, c2))
  mp2an(ran(c0)[≼]_om, ran(c2)[≼]_om, ran(c2)[≼]_om)
  ax-mp(ran(c2)[≼]_om, c2[≼]_om)
  eqbrtri(c2, cdom, com, (s0 ∈ ℤ, s1 ∈ ℤ ↦((s0[÷](2[^]s1))[[,)]((s0[+]1)[÷](2[^]s1)))))
  mp2an((s0 ∈ ℤ, s1 ∈ ℤ ↦((s0[÷](2[^]s1))[[,)]((s0[+]1)[÷](2[^]s1))))[≼]_om, ℤ[≼]_om, ℤ[≼]_om)
  mp2an(ℤ[≼]_om, ℤ[≅]ℕ, ℕ[≼]_om)
  znnen()
  nnct()
  endomtr(cz, cn, com)
  mpt2cti(s0, s1, cz, cz, ((s0[÷](2[^]s1))[[,)]((s0[+]1)[÷](2[^]s1))), universe)
  rgen2w(s0, s1, cz, cz, ((s0[÷](2[^]s1))[[,)]((s0[+]1)[÷](2[^]s1)))∈ 𝕌)
  ovex((s0[÷](2[^]s1)), cico, ((s0[+]1)[÷](2[^]s1)))
  rnct(c2)
  3syl((ran(c2)[≼]_om ∧ ran(c2)[≼]_om), ran(c0)[≼]_om, (s2 ∈ ran(c2), s3 ∈ ran(c2)↦(s2 × s3))[≼]_om, c0[≼]_om)
  mpt2cti(s2, s3, ran(c2), ran(c2), (s2 × s3), universe)
  rgen2w(s2, s3, ran(c2), ran(c2), (s2 × s3)∈ 𝕌)
  xpex(s2, s3)
  vex(s2)
  vex(s3)
  biimpri((s2 ∈ ran(c2), s3 ∈ ran(c2)↦(s2 × s3))[≼]_om, c0[≼]_om)
  breq1i(c0, cdom, com, (s2 ∈ ran(c2), s3 ∈ ran(c2)↦(s2 × s3)))
  rnct(c0)
  diff.cz.s(s0)
  diff.cz.s(s1)
  diff.crn.s(s2, c2)
  diff.crn.s(s3, c2)
}

blocks.name: dya2iocnrect
blocks.content: For any point of an open rectangle in ` ( RR X. RR ) ` , there is a closed-below open-above dyadic rational square which contains that point and is included in the rectangle. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 12-Oct-2017.)

blocks.name: dya2iocnei
blocks.content: For any point of an open set of the usual topology on ` ( RR X. RR ) ` there is a closed-below open-above dyadic rational square which contains that point and is entirely in the open set. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 21-Sep-2017.)

blocks.name: dya2iocuni
blocks.content: Every open set of ` ( RR X. RR ) ` is a union of closed-below open-above dyadic rational rectangular subsets of ` ( RR X. RR ) ` . This union must be a countable union by ~ dya2iocct . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 18-Sep-2017.)

  -| wceq(c0, cmpo(s2, s3, crn(c2), crn(c2), cxp(cv(s2), cv(s3))))

blocks.name: sxbrsigalem1
blocks.content: The Borel algebra on ` ( RR X. RR ) ` is a subset of the sigma-algebra generated by the dyadic closed-below, open-above rectangular subsets of ` ( RR X. RR ) ` . This is a step of the proof of Proposition 1.1.5 of [Cohn] p. 4. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 17-Sep-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm sxbrsigalem1(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wss(cfv(csigagen, co(c0, ctx, c0)), cfv(csigagen, crn(c1)))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpo(s0, s1, cz, cz, co(co(cv(s0), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1))), cico, co(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1))))))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpo(s2, s3, crn(c2), crn(c2), cxp(cv(s2), cv(s3))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s3, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(wss(cfv(csigagen, co(c0, ctx, c0)), cfv(csigagen, crn(c1))), diffsc(s1, c1))
  mp3an(wss(cfv(csigagen, co(c0, ctx, c0)), cfv(csigagen, crn(c1))), wceq(cuni(co(c0, ctx, c0)), cuni(crn(c1))), wss(co(c0, ctx, c0), cfv(csigagen, crn(c1))), wcel(crn(c1), universe))
  eqtr2i(cuni(co(c0, ctx, c0)), cuni(crn(c1)), cxp(cr, cr))
  dya2iocucvr(s0, s1, s2, s3, c1, c0, c2)
  txunii(cr, cr, c0, c0)
  eqeltri(c0, ctop, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))
  retop()
  eqtr4i(cr, cuni(c0), cuni(cfv(ctg, crn(cioo))))
  uniretop()
  unieqi(c0, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))
  ssriv(s0, co(c0, ctx, c0), cfv(csigagen, crn(c1)))
  syl(wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, ctx, c0)), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(csigagen, crn(c1))), wrex(hs0, cpw(crn(c1)), wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cv(s0))))
  dya2iocuni(hs0, s0, s1, s2, s3, cv(s0), c0, c1, c2)
  rexlimiva(hs0, cpw(crn(c1)), wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(csigagen, crn(c1))))
  eqeltrrd(cv(s0), cfv(csigagen, crn(c1)), cuni(cv(hs0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(crn(c1))), wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cv(s0))))
  simpr(wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(crn(c1))), wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cv(s0)))
  adantr(wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(crn(c1))), wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cv(s0)), wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), cfv(csigagen, crn(c1))))
  syl3anc(wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(crn(c1))), wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), cfv(csigagen, crn(c1))), wcel(crn(c1), universe), wss(cv(hs0), crn(c1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com))
  mp1i(wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(crn(c1))), wcel(crn(c1), universe), wbr(crn(c1), cdom, com))
  sylancl(wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(crn(c1))), wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wss(cv(hs0), crn(c1)), wbr(crn(c1), cdom, com))
  elpwi(cv(hs0), crn(c1))
  ssct(cv(hs0), crn(c1))
  elsigagen2(crn(c1), universe, cv(hs0))
  ax-mp(wcel(crn(c1), universe), wbr(crn(c1), cdom, com))
  dya2iocct(s0, s1, s2, s3, c1, c0, c2)
  ctex(crn(c1))
  sigagenss2(co(c0, ctx, c0), crn(c1), universe)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, ctx, c0)
  diff.ctx.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, csigagen, crn(c1))
  diff.csigagen.s(s0)
  diff.crn.s(s0, c1)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.s(s3)
  diff.hs0.c(cv(s0))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s3, s0)
  diffss.ex(s3, s0)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(csigagen, crn(c1))))
}

thm sxbrsigalem1(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (sigaGen `(c0[tX]c0))⊆(sigaGen ` ran(c1))
  ⊣ c0 =(topGen ` ran((,)))
  ⊣ c2 =(s0 ∈ ℤ, s1 ∈ ℤ ↦((s0[÷](2[^]s1))[[,)]((s0[+]1)[÷](2[^]s1))))
  ⊣ c1 =(s2 ∈ ran(c2), s3 ∈ ran(c2)↦(s2 × s3))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s3, c2)
} = {
  a1ii((sigaGen `(c0[tX]c0))⊆(sigaGen ` ran(c1)), d(s1, c1))
  mp3an((sigaGen `(c0[tX]c0))⊆(sigaGen ` ran(c1)), ⋃(c0[tX]c0)= ⋃ ran(c1), (c0[tX]c0)⊆(sigaGen ` ran(c1)), ran(c1)∈ 𝕌)
  eqtr2i(⋃(c0[tX]c0), ⋃ ran(c1), (ℝ × ℝ))
  dya2iocucvr(s0, s1, s2, s3, c1, c0, c2)
  txunii(cr, cr, c0, c0)
  eqeltri(c0, ctop, (topGen ` ran((,))))
  retop()
  eqtr4i(cr, ⋃ c0, ⋃(topGen ` ran((,))))
  uniretop()
  unieqi(c0, (topGen ` ran((,))))
  ssriv(s0, (c0[tX]c0), (sigaGen ` ran(c1)))
  syl(s0 ∈(c0[tX]c0), s0 ∈(sigaGen ` ran(c1)), ∃(hs0 ∈ P(ran(c1)), ⋃ hs0 = s0))
  dya2iocuni(hs0, s0, s1, s2, s3, s0, c0, c1, c2)
  rexlimiva(hs0, P(ran(c1)), ⋃ hs0 = s0, s0 ∈(sigaGen ` ran(c1)))
  eqeltrrd(s0, (sigaGen ` ran(c1)), ⋃ hs0, (hs0 ∈ P(ran(c1))∧ ⋃ hs0 = s0))
  simpr(hs0 ∈ P(ran(c1)), ⋃ hs0 = s0)
  adantr(hs0 ∈ P(ran(c1)), ⋃ hs0 = s0, ⋃ hs0 ∈(sigaGen ` ran(c1)))
  syl3anc(hs0 ∈ P(ran(c1)), ⋃ hs0 ∈(sigaGen ` ran(c1)), ran(c1)∈ 𝕌, hs0 ⊆ ran(c1), hs0[≼]_om)
  mp1i(hs0 ∈ P(ran(c1)), ran(c1)∈ 𝕌, ran(c1)[≼]_om)
  sylancl(hs0 ∈ P(ran(c1)), hs0[≼]_om, hs0 ⊆ ran(c1), ran(c1)[≼]_om)
  elpwi(hs0, ran(c1))
  ssct(hs0, ran(c1))
  elsigagen2(ran(c1), universe, hs0)
  ax-mp(ran(c1)∈ 𝕌, ran(c1)[≼]_om)
  dya2iocct(s0, s1, s2, s3, c1, c0, c2)
  ctex(ran(c1))
  sigagenss2((c0[tX]c0), ran(c1), universe)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, ctx, c0)
  diff.ctx.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, csigagen, ran(c1))
  diff.csigagen.s(s0)
  diff.crn.s(s0, c1)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.s(s3)
  diff.hs0.c(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s3, s0)
  diffss.ex(s3, s0)
  diff.hs0.w(s0 ∈(sigaGen ` ran(c1)))
}

blocks.name: sxbrsigalem2
blocks.content: The sigma-algebra generated by the dyadic closed-below, open-above rectangular subsets of ` ( RR X. RR ) ` is a subset of the sigma-algebra generated by the closed half-spaces of ` ( RR X. RR ) ` . The proof goes by noting the fact that the dyadic rectangles are intersections of a 'vertical band' and an 'horizontal band', which themselves are differences of closed half-spaces. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 17-Sep-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm sxbrsigalem2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wss(cfv(csigagen, crn(c0)), cfv(csigagen, cun(crn(cmpt(s0, cr, cxp(co(cv(s0), cico, cpnf), cr))), crn(cmpt(s1, cr, cxp(cr, co(cv(s1), cico, cpnf)))))))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpo(s2, s3, cz, cz, co(co(cv(s2), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s3))), cico, co(co(cv(s2), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s3))))))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpo(s4, s5, crn(c2), crn(c2), cxp(cv(s4), cv(s5))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s5)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s5)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s5)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffss(s3, s5)
  -| diffss(s4, s5)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
  -| diffsc(s4, c2)
  -| diffsc(s5, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(wss(cfv(csigagen, crn(c0)), cfv(csigagen, cun(crn(cmpt(s0, cr, cxp(co(cv(s0), cico, cpnf), cr))), crn(cmpt(s1, cr, cxp(cr, co(cv(s1), cico, cpnf))))))), diffsc(s2, c0))

blocks.name: sxbrsigalem4
blocks.content: The Borel algebra on ` ( RR X. RR ) ` is generated by the dyadic closed-below, open-above rectangular subsets of ` ( RR X. RR ) ` . Proposition 1.1.5 of [Cohn] p. 4 . Note that the interval used in this formalization are closed-below, open-above instead of open-below, closed-above in the proof as they are ultimately generated by the floor function. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 21-Sep-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm sxbrsigalem4(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(cfv(csigagen, co(c0, ctx, c0)), cfv(csigagen, crn(c1)))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpo(s0, s1, cz, cz, co(co(cv(s0), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1))), cico, co(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1))))))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpo(s2, s3, crn(c2), crn(c2), cxp(cv(s2), cv(s3))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s3, c2)
} = {
  eqssi(cfv(csigagen, co(c0, ctx, c0)), cfv(csigagen, crn(c1)))
  sxbrsigalem1(s0, s1, s2, s3, c0, c1, c2)
  sstri(cfv(csigagen, crn(c1)), cfv(csigagen, co(c0, ctx, c0)), cfv(csigagen, cfv(ccld, co(c0, ctx, c0))))
  sstri(cfv(csigagen, crn(c1)), cfv(csigagen, cfv(ccld, co(c0, ctx, c0))), cfv(csigagen, cun(crn(cmpt(hs0, cr, cxp(co(cv(hs0), cico, cpnf), cr))), crn(cmpt(hs1, cr, cxp(cr, co(cv(hs1), cico, cpnf)))))))
  sxbrsigalem2(hs0, hs1, s0, s1, s2, s3, c1, c0, c2)
  sxbrsigalem3(hs0, hs1, c0)
  mp3an(wss(cfv(csigagen, cfv(ccld, co(c0, ctx, c0))), cfv(csigagen, co(c0, ctx, c0))), wceq(cuni(cfv(ccld, co(c0, ctx, c0))), cuni(co(c0, ctx, c0))), wss(cfv(ccld, co(c0, ctx, c0)), cfv(csigagen, co(c0, ctx, c0))), wcel(co(c0, ctx, c0), ctop))
  unicls(co(c0, ctx, c0), cuni(co(c0, ctx, c0)))
  eqid(cuni(co(c0, ctx, c0)))
  ax-mp(wss(cfv(ccld, co(c0, ctx, c0)), cfv(csigagen, co(c0, ctx, c0))), wcel(co(c0, ctx, c0), ctop))
  cldssbrsiga(co(c0, ctx, c0))
  topontopi(co(c0, ctx, c0), cxp(cr, cr))
  tpr2tp(c0)
  sigagenss2(cfv(ccld, co(c0, ctx, c0)), co(c0, ctx, c0), ctop)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.s(s3)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.hs1.s(s2)
  diff.hs1.s(s3)
}

thm sxbrsigalem4(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (sigaGen `(c0[tX]c0))=(sigaGen ` ran(c1))
  ⊣ c0 =(topGen ` ran((,)))
  ⊣ c2 =(s0 ∈ ℤ, s1 ∈ ℤ ↦((s0[÷](2[^]s1))[[,)]((s0[+]1)[÷](2[^]s1))))
  ⊣ c1 =(s2 ∈ ran(c2), s3 ∈ ran(c2)↦(s2 × s3))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s3, c2)
} = {
  eqssi((sigaGen `(c0[tX]c0)), (sigaGen ` ran(c1)))
  sxbrsigalem1(s0, s1, s2, s3, c0, c1, c2)
  sstri((sigaGen ` ran(c1)), (sigaGen `(c0[tX]c0)), (sigaGen `(Clsd `(c0[tX]c0))))
  sstri((sigaGen ` ran(c1)), (sigaGen `(Clsd `(c0[tX]c0))), (sigaGen `(ran((hs0 ∈ ℝ ↦((hs0[[,)]+∞)× ℝ)))⋃ ran((hs1 ∈ ℝ ↦(ℝ ×(hs1[[,)]+∞)))))))
  sxbrsigalem2(hs0, hs1, s0, s1, s2, s3, c1, c0, c2)
  sxbrsigalem3(hs0, hs1, c0)
  mp3an((sigaGen `(Clsd `(c0[tX]c0)))⊆(sigaGen `(c0[tX]c0)), ⋃(Clsd `(c0[tX]c0))= ⋃(c0[tX]c0), (Clsd `(c0[tX]c0))⊆(sigaGen `(c0[tX]c0)), (c0[tX]c0)∈ Top)
  unicls((c0[tX]c0), ⋃(c0[tX]c0))
  eqid(⋃(c0[tX]c0))
  ax-mp((Clsd `(c0[tX]c0))⊆(sigaGen `(c0[tX]c0)), (c0[tX]c0)∈ Top)
  cldssbrsiga((c0[tX]c0))
  topontopi((c0[tX]c0), (ℝ × ℝ))
  tpr2tp(c0)
  sigagenss2((Clsd `(c0[tX]c0)), (c0[tX]c0), ctop)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.s(s3)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.hs1.s(s2)
  diff.hs1.s(s3)
}

  -| wceq(c2, cmpo(s2, s3, crn(c1), crn(c1), cxp(cv(s2), cv(s3))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)

  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c1)
